  • Method Details

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String username)
      Set the username of the teacher. Username should not contain any space with length in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_USERNAME_LENGTH_LIMIT). Username should also be unique in teacher database
      Overrides:
      setUsername in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      username - Username of teacher
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Duplicate username in teacher database, contain space in username, or length out of range

    • forceSetUsername

      public void forceSetUsername(String username)
      Set the username of the teacher without checking if it exists in database Username should not contain any space with length in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_USERNAME_LENGTH_LIMIT).
      Parameters:
      username - Username of teacher
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Contain space in username, or length out of range

    • setAge

      public void setAge(int age)
      Set the age of the teacher Age should be in range (TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_AGE_LOWER_LIMIT, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_AGE_UPPER_LIMIT).
      Overrides:
      setAge in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      age - Age of teacher
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Age out of range

    • setAge

      public void setAge(String age)
      Set the age of the teacher Age should be in range (TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_AGE_LOWER_LIMIT, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_AGE_UPPER_LIMIT).
      Parameters:
      age - Age of teacher
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Age out of range or is not an integer

    • setDepartment

      public void setDepartment(String department)
      Set the department teacher belongs to Department length should be in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_DEPT_LENGTH_LIMIT).
      Overrides:
      setDepartment in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      department - Department teacher belongs to
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Length of department out of range

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Set the name of the teacher Name length should be in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_NAME_LENGTH_LIMIT).
      Overrides:
      setName in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      name - Teacher name
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Length of name out of range

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Set the password of the teacher account Password should:
    • have length in range (0, TeacherDatabase.TEACHER_PASSWORD_LENGTH_LIMIT)
    • contain no blank space
    • have at least 1 capital letter
    • have at least 1 small letter
    • have at least 1 number
    • have at least 1 special character "!@$%^invalid input: '&'*_+invalid input: '<'>/-"
      • Overrides:
      setPassword in class Personnel
      Parameters:
      password - Teacher name
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Any above condition is not met

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Access the position of the teacher
      Returns:
      Position of the teacher

      public void setPosition(Position position)
      Set the position of the teacher

      public void setPosition(String position)
      Set the position of the teacher
      Throws:
      Exception - Position does not exist

      Check if the confirmed password same as the password set
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Password unmatched
